item.title: CNHI
item.description: score:23 Chances: CNHI has unveiled its very first full-electric mini excavator model, showing innovation and commitment to sustainable technologies. The company completed transactions in the period November 27, 2023 through November 28, 2023, under its $1 billion share buyback program, indicating confidence in its own stock.
